channel.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
channel.description: Is there any way to get the project exported FROM auxy as an MP3 file? I know you could do audio but it exports it as a .mpa or something that isn‚Äôt MP3.. I have to put it into Logic and convert it which takes a good amount of time- just wondering if I‚Äôm missing something üëåüèª Thanks

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
You can definitely export an uncompressed wave file. If you need mp3 for sure, you‚Äôll need to use some kind of converter

item.description:

item.description:
Just out of curiosity, why mp3 over m4a/mpa or whatever? They‚Äôre both space saving.

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Usually, I don‚Äôt go for quality when getting a simple render to listen to for the sake of determining what should sound like what, etc. etc.

Quality isn‚Äôt a concern at that point in the process at the very least. Usually, it‚Äôs more about convenience than anything else.

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
You probably grabbed it at a good time, looks like it‚Äôs subscription based now. Bear in mind they are shuttling your data to a server in the cloud and then spitting back your converted content to you - some people aren‚Äôt comfortable with that.

Otherwise seems ok

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files

item.description:
Try this app. Mind it does cost $1 (I think), but it converts literally anything.

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Auxy won‚Äôt export mp3 directly. The only DAW I‚Äôve ever used that does is FLStudio (not sure about Live/Reaper, I know for sure Reason doesn‚Äôt). It‚Äôs due to licensing costs AFAIK.

Like Cornea said there are converters. A lot of them are ad supported. They look pretty janky so be careful. I recall seeing a Shortcuts (formerly Workflow) script/run book for it but don‚Äôt recall if I ever got it working

Read full topic

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
item.dc:creator: Cornea
item.description:
TheRealJFalc:

Alternatively, you could upload to soundcloud as a private upload then rip it from SC with a mp3 downloader

99.99% of the time this results in less quality. I also remember auxy already having an option for mp3?

There are some converters on the app store for mp3 if u need em

Read full topic

item.title: Converting Auxy Projects to .MP3 Files
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Use Audacity to convert it. Probably will be faster

Alternatively, you could upload to soundcloud as a private upload then rip it from SC with a mp3 downloader. I‚Äôve done that so many times out of laziness and the fact that the iPod classic I use doesn‚Äôt work with m4a files so I have to have it all converted to mp3. Usually, I do this for a track so I can listen to it for some time before moving it into FL and stuff.

Read full topic
